result.execSummary:
The defendant Jawan L Clash was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jawan L Clash is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jawan L Clash was found guilty of Substantial Battery-Intend Bodily Harm, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Sentence deemed served. Concur to revocation time in 08CF1894 & 14CM881.
$250 DNA surcharge & court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jawan L Clash

records.addlTxt: Payment info sent to defendant at DCJ
Copy of minutes from PLEAS Hrg on 7/5/22 sent electronically to DCJ

11:25 AM- IN CUSTODY 

Defendant Jawan L Clash in court with attorney Paul M Fredrickson. Prosecuting Atty Robin W Lee appeared for State of Wisconsin. Plea questionnaire submitted states misd. battery but parties verbally agree to substantial battery. 

Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count(s) 1.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

AMENDMENTS: 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #2. 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #1 
The Court sentences Defendant to:
-Serve 6 months in Dane County Jail, with Huber; cc to revocation time in 08CF1894 & 14CM881; deemed served by jail credit

-Days credit for time served: 223 days  (from February 13 until today) 
-Days credit to jail: 223 days (from February 13 until today) 

COURT COSTS:
Ct #1
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days. 

-DNA on file

-Defendant advised of post-conviction rights

A. Martinelli
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
